bill_title: to require a legislative interim study of the state's election laws.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a legislative interim study of the state's election laws. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council shall appoint an interim study committee to conduct a thorough review of the state's election laws, including provisions dealing with elections, campaign practices, and political parties. The committee shall report its findings and recommendations to the 1998 Legislature. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
